channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: TMC - Defects -FW6 Potholes problem, 23rd September
item.description:

item.title: TMC - Defects - Vegetation problem, 23rd September
item.description:
PLEASE CUT BACK HEDGE TO BOUNDARY 8M either side of pinpoint FOOTPATH CLOSURE NOT MARKED (Overgrown Hedge)
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Signage and barriers left by contractors, 23rd September
item.description:
This has been closed without resolution. These articles pose a trip and health and safety hazard. If the issue is considered closed, please say why it is closed. Passed onto another department maybe? As a member of the public the issue is considered open until trip hazard is removed. Please ensure someone who is both responsible and accountable for this issue is informed. Thank you

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 15, Brookway Drive, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: Signs & Barriers left behind by Contractor

item.title: Block Road Gulley, 23rd September
item.description:
Drain outside number 7 court Road is blocked and is heavy flow when there is rainfall, I have reported this issue about a month ago and there hasn’t been any response.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Court Road, Brockworth, Tewkesbury
